attributes.action: Let us perform grease lightning at our leavers assembly
attributes.additional_details: We all enjoy the musical Grease, I myself am a keen admirer of John Travolta. I wish to honour their play with my soulful rendition. if our lovely government would consider having a lengthy debate on this topic, I would be very grateful and would forever vote whatever party is in power. so a free vote is up for grabs here boys.
attributes.background: I am a student and I'm in my final year, I would like to perform a rendition of grease with my fellow musical enthusiasts. our current position could be described as slightly bothersome and request some assistance in winning over the heart and mind of our teacher dearest.
